text: 4.10: VB 4.4; 4.9; 5.1; 5.7-8; 5.13-14; 6.16; 7.15; 19.4; 21.5Mbe maaŋ mbui tugar, mba 24 gumgir pani, mbe zazera mba ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan pigi mpirmpirɨga pigi guma, mbe ana nɨman thɨvi phɨra fav, ana rotu mbui. Ana zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki guma ma. Mbe zazera wari won gorar muuŋgi khorshɨgi, mbe nta fuav, ana ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan pigi mpirmpirɨga nɨma sui. Mbe nta ndi suav khaŋ muuŋgia tɨgap, ŋgava mbui.
